expo.name: Mocktologist
expo.description: Mocktologist is the ultimate companion app to get creative with making new mocktails. Our virtual bartender will generate a mocktail based on your preferences, and you can follow along with the recipe given, take a pic of your creation and log it. Best served cold, at parties, or just to get creative!

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
